feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission clearly describes and demonstrates a working financial application: it ingests transaction CSVs, analyzes spending, produces budgets, recommendations, and a 90-day plan (Implement evidence) driven by a stated goal to create a finance advisor (Discover). The depth and concrete outputs shown justify a PASS under the moderate DRIVER-aligned standard.
- Integrate AI: The submission clearly describes AI as the core "brain" that ingests CSV data, categorizes transactions, computes a financial health score, produces visualizations, and generates personalized 90-day plans and behavioral recommendations. Implementation evidence (Google AI Studio, prompt engineering, Gemini API) and the detailed description of AI-driven outputs show effective, substantive integration beyond a superficial use, satisfying PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "I decided to do build a financial health advisor that analyzes your current spending habits and then advises you on your next steps in terms of better budgeting better spending habits"

"I thought about it in terms of the driver framework where I was like okay I want to obviously have a financial health advisor tool that will take in input of your current state of finances and output you basically, I guess, an improved budget or a better finance plan"

"uploading your spending data that you have will analyze your behavioral patterns, protect the credit score, as well as give you a 90-day transformation plan to improve your spending and financial habits."
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Discover: Articulated goal to build an intelligent finance tool (financial health advisor).  
- Implement: Described building and demonstrating the app (CSV upload, processing, outputs like health score, budgets, graphs) in Google AI Studio.  
- Reflect: Reflected on effectiveness and tooling (Gemini API) confirming functioning implementation.
criteria.reasoning: The submission clearly describes and demonstrates a working financial application: it ingests transaction CSVs, analyzes spending, produces budgets, recommendations, and a 90-day plan (Implement evidence) driven by a stated goal to create a finance advisor (Discover). The depth and concrete outputs shown justify a PASS under the moderate DRIVER-aligned standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "So it's the compassionate financial diagnosis, where just uploading your spending data that you have will analyze your behavioral patterns, protect the credit score, as well as give you a 90-day transformation plan to improve your spending and financial habits."
"in Google AI Studio I just very simply used a little bit of prompt engineering..."
"the Gemini API has been very strong, very helpful to make this happen and build it out"
criteria.reasoning: The submission clearly describes AI as the core "brain" that ingests CSV data, categorizes transactions, computes a financial health score, produces visualizations, and generates personalized 90-day plans and behavioral recommendations. Implementation evidence (Google AI Studio, prompt engineering, Gemini API) and the detailed description of AI-driven outputs show effective, substantive integration beyond a superficial use, satisfying PASS.
